thread.title: Brazil Nature Tours Invited to Participate at World Travel Market Tourism Fair
thread.title_full: Brazil Nature Tours Invited to Participate at World Travel Market Tourism Fair

title: Brazil Nature Tours Invited to Participate at World Travel Market Tourism Fair
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Brazil Nature Tours Invited to Participate at World Travel Market Tourism Fair The Campo Grande-based travel agency has been invited to participate at the World Travel Market Tourism Fair in London this year. They will be at the EMBRATUR stand representing the State of Mato Grosso do Sul. LONDON, ENGLAND, October 21,   Held annually in London, the World Travel Market is a lively business-to-business event and is one of the world's largest tourism fairs. This year, it will take place on 4 days, starting from Monday, 02 November to Thursday, 05 November 2015 at ExCeL London. The venue, ExCeL London lies on the northern berth of the Royal Victoria Dock in London Docklands. It is an international convention centre situated in Newham. It is an important meeting point for exhibitors from all over the world. The event is being administered and managed by Reed Travel Exhibitions, which is also an events organizer for other travel industry related events. The World Travel Market presents with a varied range of industry sectors and destinations to the United Kingdom and other international travel experts. The trade fair provides with a unique platform for the whole international trade to meet, discuss and conduct business. The latest developments in the travel industry are also being showcased here. It brings together, the airlines, tour operators, hotels and the online travel services under a single roof. Over the past three decades, since its commencement in 1980, the World Trade Market Tourism fair has attracted a range of celebrities to the event. Some of the celebrity visitors include the film star Michael Douglas and Sir Steve Redgrave, who is five times Olympic gold medalist. In this event, the UK travel agents can gather Accredited Travel Professional points (also known as ATP points). It is estimated that, more than 50,000 travel industry professionals, international press and the government ministers attend this event every November, at ExCeL London. The event is now in its 36th year, and it generates more than GBP2.5 billion worth of contracts related to travel industry. The World Travel Market attracts more than 5000 exhibiting participants. These participants look forward to display and showcase their travel industry related services and products. Different varieties of travel and accommodation services like the flight service packages, ticketing services and land travel services are showcased at the event. This year, Brazil Nature Tours will be attending the World Travel Market in London. BNT is based in Brazil and is a DMC specialized in eco-tourism. It will be representing the state of Mato Grosso do Sul, a state known for it's wonderful flora and fauna, with places like the Pantanal and Bonito. Brazil Nature Tours (BNT) is a Brazilian DMC with Dutch/French management, specialized in organizing travel arrangements and tours within Brazil with high quality service and competative prices, both for groups and individuals. Set up in June 2000 and located in Campo Grande, the Capital of the State Mato Grosso do Sul and main gateway for visits to the Pantanal and Bonito. Most of our customers are travel agents from all over the world for whom we operate as destination management company for the whole country or as incoming specialist for tours to the Central West Region. However, with technology such as the internet we're also offering individual travel packages on-line. The main target in all our operations and routes across Brazil, is to proportionate the entire satisfaction of our travelers, who's main concern will be to bring their luggage and to come with good humor. All the rest is our concern, we have an excellent record of customer satisfaction. # # #
